description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f9ak8","text":"Protocols for Hematoxylin and Eosin staining and Immunofluorescence for two SPARC datasets: Safety Study of Wireless Fecobionics Device and Safety testing of predicate device for Fecobionics. The procedures were approved by Calmi2 Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC)\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":91,"length":44},{"style":"italic","offset":140,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ff7m","text":"Mongrel dogs were randomly assigned into two groups: the Fecobionics device group, and the THD SensyProbe control group. All animals were anesthetized, the devices were transanally inserted into the rectum, and then inflated at 20 ml. Six minutes later the devices were removed either naturally or manually. The animals in each group were randomly assigned into two subgroups, acute and chronic. The dogs in the acute subgroups were euthanized immediately after the removal of the devices, whereas the dogs in the chronic groups were euthanized two weeks after the device removal. The tissue samples were harvested upon sacrifice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iti8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et8ip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâs working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dss6n","text":"Fix the tissues with 4% paraformaldehyde (pH 7.4) overnight at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"51hqv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F3A267508E9911EC88E1634A0350D7DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"co9ff","text":"Put the frozen slides at room temperature for 30min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5v3ih","text":"Embed the tissues with Optimal Cutting Temperature (OCT) compound and freeze with liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fh645","text":"Rinse in a gentle stream of tap water until OCT is washed off for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eqpp","text":"Wash in a gentle stream of tap water for 1 minute, then dip in saturated lithium carbonate solution for 45 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tmbg","text":"Wash in a gentle stream of tap water for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9d1pl","text":"Clear through 3 changes of Xylene for 1 minute each and coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2prjq","text":"Wash slides with PBS 3 times. Each time 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgda8","text":"Incubate slide with primary antibody diluted in 0.25% triton 2.5% Donkey serum 1xPBS at room temperature for 3 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4jb4k","text":"Wash slides with PBS 3 times. Each time 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b8jqo","text":"Incubate slide with secondary antibody (1:100 dilution) for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18rk2","text":"Wash slides with PBS 2 times. Each time 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1l3mr","text":"Stain with Wheat Germ Agglutinin (1:100 dilution) for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
